title: Chapter 4420 - Chapter 4420: 4419, Beneath The Trembling Land Of Origin
body:
Chapter 4420 - Chapter 4420: 4419, Beneath The Trembling Land Of Origin

Chapter 4420: 4419, beneath the trembling land of origin

The Deputy Palace Master of the God Palace was fleeing in the land of origin with a face full of shock and anger.

He was preparing to escape into the boundless chaos from the place of resurrection.

The further the better.

He would run as far as he could.

He came out from a cave in the land of origin and flew in a direction far away.

When he didn’t fly for long, he saw a powerful energy fluctuation ahead.

This caused his gaze to freeze. He didn’t pay too much attention to it and continued flying forward.

In front of him, there were more than ten heavenly yuan blessed realm experts surrounding and attacking a Chaos Behemoth.

This group of experts was extremely powerful.

There was even an existence at the Great Dao realm amongst them.

That Chaos Behemoth was completely unable to resist against such a group of people.

Even if it wanted to escape, it would find it hard to do so.

This also made their attacks very easy.

The Vice Palace Master of the Cosmos God Palace quickly flew over, attracting the attention of those experts.

“Yi?”

One of the control-level experts felt that the Vice Palace Master of the Cosmos God Palace was familiar.

“The Vice Palace Master of the Cosmos God Palace?”

He recognized him and raised his brows before shouting.

“Belief in the Deputy Palace Master of the Cosmos God Palace? Hong Ying, do you know him?”

The Great Dao realm expert in the middle asked with a face full of astonishment.

The belief universe was a famous existence around the land of origin.

There were 24 powerful palaces in the universe, and the number of heaven origin creation realm experts was terrifying.

Furthermore, they occupied two universes. Furthermore, the moment this calamity erupted, the belief universe’s deity Palace occupied another universe.

Their strength made all the powerful beings in the surrounding universes tremble in fear!

Facing the powerful beings that believed in the universe, the powerful beings in the other universes had to be careful too!

“Eh?”

The Deputy Palace Master of God looked over when he heard someone calling him.

However, at this moment, he was trying to escape, so he didn’t care about it at all.

“Can you escape?”

However, at this moment, a voice that terrified him entered his ears.

When he heard this voice, his body trembled violently.

“No, save me!”

With a face full of fear, he roared and flew toward the group of experts.

Wang Xian’s figure appeared and looked at him indifferently.

“What?”

In front of him, the more than ten experts were stunned when they saw this sudden scene.

“My friend, what grudge do you have with the Deputy Palace Master of the God of Light?”

Among the more than ten people, the middle-aged man who was at the control level had a thoughtful look on his face before he asked.

Wang Xian ignored him when he heard his words. With a flash, he arrived in front of the Deputy Palace Master of the god of light.

“Bang!”

He waved his arm and an extremely terrifying energy engulfed him.

“No!”

The Deputy Palace Master of the deity let out a final roar in despair.

“This? ? ?”

When the dozen of people saw that the deputy palace master of the deity was instantly killed, they were stunned.

Their pupils contracted slightly. They knew that Wang Xian was an existence at the Great Dao level.

“My Friend, the one you killed was the son of the strongest force in the universe, the palace master of the Deity Palace.”

The control-level powerhouse opened his mouth and couldn’t help but continue.

“And then?”

Wang Xian kept the corpse of the Deputy Palace Master of the God Palace and looked at the middle-aged man who was talking.

“It’s nothing. I’m just saying.”

The powerhouse was slightly stunned and shook his head.

“You talk too much nonsense. Do You Know Him?”

Wang Xian raised his eyebrows and looked at him as he asked.

The middle-aged man frowned slightly when he heard Wang Xian’s words. He didn’t say anything else.

Wang Xian noticed that the middle-aged man didn’t say anything. His eyes flickered and a hint of coldness flashed across his eyes. “I’m asking you a question!”

“You said that I talk too much nonsense, so I won’t say it anymore.”

The middle-aged man frowned and said faintly!

“Ha, alright, then disappear from my sight!”

Wang Xian smiled coldly and his figure disappeared instantly!

When they reacted, he arrived in front of the middle-aged man and placed his palm on his head!

“What?”

At the side, the Great Dao expert only sensed it when Wang Xian appeared in front of them.

His pupils contracted slightly and a look of astonishment appeared on his face.

How could he be so fast?

How could he appear in front of them before he could even sense himself?

“Bang!”

Wang Xian pressed his palm down and killed him directly.

Wang Xian wiped his palm casually and kept the corpse.

“Uncle Hao!”

At the side, a young man exclaimed loudly.

He stared at Wang Xian with anger on his face.

Wang Xian looked at the young man and flicked his finger.

“Bam!”

A wave of energy penetrated the young man directly.

It was still an instant kill!

Wang Xian waved his arm and grabbed the young man’s corpse and kept it.

This group of Heaven origin creation realm powerhouses all had several lives. Therefore, Wang Xian had taken their lives as an offense to him.

“This…”

Wang Xian had killed two of them in an instant. This caused the breathing of the other Heaven’s origin powerhouses to stop for a moment. A look of fear appeared on their faces.

“This… senior, we didn’t mean to offend you.”

The pupils of the Great Dao level powerhouse contracted slightly. He cupped his hands and said to Wang Xian.

He couldn’t help but swallow a mouthful of saliva.

The strength that Wang Xian displayed made him feel a little shocked.

A beginner-level expert at the snap of a finger level.

An existence at the control level was instantly killed.

Although he was an existence at the Great Dao level, he couldn’t do it at all.

What made him even more shocked was that he couldn’t sense the opponent’s presence in front of him in advance.

What realm was this expert at to be so terrifying?

Wang Xian took a glance at him, moved his body and left instantly!

Wang Xian wouldn’t show mercy if someone was courting death.

If someone wasn’t courting death, he had no interest in killing them.

Even though Wang Xian could do it casually, even though their corpses were huge resources.

This was a matter of principle.

Wang Xian’s silent departure shocked the powerhouse at the Great Dao realm again.

Beads of cold sweat appeared on his forehead!

“Senior Tian Quan, what… What kind of existence is this powerhouse? He… He…”

At the side, more than ten other powerhouses widened their eyes when they saw Wang Xian leaving. They asked in shock.

“I don’t know. The other party’s strength is extremely terrifying. I can’t even sense his every move.”

“If he wants to attack me, I might not be able to react in time.”

The Great Dao expert called Tian Quan wiped the sweat off his forehead and said.

“How is this possible?”

His words caused the surrounding experts to be extremely shocked.

Senior Tian Quan was an existence at the Great Dao level.

However, when they thought of their two companions who had been killed, they also became slightly silent.

They knew that senior Tianquan couldn’t do it so casually!
